DOC.brief_summary: To determine change biomarkers associate use electronic cigarette among African American menthol nonmenthol smoker .
DOC.brief_title: Changes Biomarkers Associated With Use Electronic Cigarettes
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Aim : To determine change biomarkers associate use electronic cigarette among African American menthol nonmenthol smoker . Primary Hypothesis : At 8 week 24 week post-enrollment , significant association use electronic cigarette biomarkers smoke exposure change biomarkers baseline follow-up high among participant randomize active e-cigarette condition .
DOC.criteria: 1. selfidentify African American Black ; 2. age 18 year old ; 3. smoke least five cigarette daily past year ; 4. interested quit smoke next 6 month ; 5 . Willing use ecigarettes ; 6 . Good physical health ( unstable medical mental health condition ) ; 7. contraindication ecigarette use . 1 . Recent unstable untreated psychiatric diagnosis include substance abuse , determine DSMIV criterion ; 2. use past 30 day tobacco nicotine product include ecigarettes , regular cigarette ; 3. participation smoking cessation program past 30 day ; 4. pregnant nursing .
